languages.text: "То я с превеликим сожалением откажусь исполнять этот приказ. Ибо ни один устав Империума не обязывает меня исполнить его".
"Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."
languages.original_text: "То я с превеликим сожалением откажусь исполнять этот приказ. Ибо ни один устав Империума не обязывает меня исполнить его".

traits.locale_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."
"Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."
"Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."
"Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."
"Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

languages.text: "Dann werde ich diesen Befehl mit großem Bedauern verweigern. Denn kein Gesetz des Imperiums zwingt mich, ihn zu befolgen."
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich diesen Befehl mit großem Bedauern verweigern. Denn kein Gesetz des Imperiums zwingt mich, ihn zu befolgen."

languages.text: « Je me verrais, avec le plus grand regret, dans l'obligation de désobéir à cet ordre, car aucune loi de l'Imperium ne m'enjoint de m'y soumettre. »
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: « Je me verrais, avec le plus grand regret, dans l'obligation de désobéir à cet ordre, car aucune loi de l'Imperium ne m'enjoint de m'y soumettre. »

languages.text: 「それなら、非常に残念ではありますが、その命令には従えません。その命令に従うことを義務づける帝国の法は存在しないからです」
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、非常に残念ではありますが、その命令には従えません。その命令に従うことを義務づける帝国の法は存在しないからです」

languages.text: «En ese caso, muy a mi pesar, me negaré a acatar esa orden, porque ninguna ley del Imperium me obliga a cumplirla».
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, muy a mi pesar, me negaré a acatar esa orden, porque ninguna ley del Imperium me obliga a cumplirla».

languages.text: “那我只能心怀无比强烈的遗憾，拒绝服从这个命令，因为没有哪条帝国律法能强迫我服从这样的命令。”
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: “那我只能心怀无比强烈的遗憾，拒绝服从这个命令，因为没有哪条帝国律法能强迫我服从这样的命令。”

languages.text: "O zaman ne yazık ki bu emre uyamam. Zira İmparatorluk'un hiçbir kanunu, beni bu emre uymaya zorlamıyor."
languages.original_text: "Then I will, with great regret, refuse to obey that order. For no law of the Imperium compels me to obey it."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman ne yazık ki bu emre uyamam. Zira İmparatorluk'un hiçbir kanunu, beni bu emre uymaya zorlamıyor."
